name: It Will Fall (MadR)
description:
'It Will Fall' is a mini-game I made for Ludum Dare 50 compo with the theme 'Delay the Inevitable'

It is a simple tower building game where the Player must stack as many items form my house on my table to achieve the highest tower without dropping more than 5 items. 

Controls:
Use LMB (left mouse button) to drag and drop items on the table
Use Mouse Scroll to move camera up or down.
